meanings.sent1: The autolysate was used in the experiment.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the autolysate under a microscope.
meanings.sent3: The autolysate decided to throw a party for all the other chemicals.
meanings.sent4: The autolysate spread through the solution like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The autolysate glowed brightly in the dark laboratory.

meanings.sent1: The cells autolysate when they reach the end of their life cycle.
meanings.sent2: During decomposition, organic matter autolysates naturally.
meanings.sent3: The leftovers in the fridge seemed to autolysate overnight.
meanings.sent4: As time passed, the old building began to autolysate into ruins.
meanings.sent5: The ice cream started to autolysate in the hot sun.
